19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated that An-Nu'man bin Bashir said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite: 'Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High' and "Has there come to you the narration of The Overwhelming?', on Friday and on 'Eid, and when Friday and 'Eid converged, he would recite them both

chapter.eng-name: When two 'Eids come together (when 'Eid falls on a Friday) and attending them both
